participant_1.background:
I work out vigorously to keep in shape and avoid eating vegetables that I dislike, which my parents are unaware of.
I'm looking for a place with more space for my stamp collection and my three dogs.
i love beef.
i like to shop at goodwill.
I prefer to live alone, enjoying the freedom to watch my foreign films without interruption.

participant_2.background:
I'm clumsy, but I don't let it stop me from living my life.
I enjoy learning new recipes to adapt to my dietary restrictions.
I went through a lot of changes in a short amount of time.
I love to challenge myself physically and mentally, and I find that yoga provides the perfect opportunity for both.
I love cooking for my family and friends, and my cat loves to eat it too!

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to cook and go to the gym. How about you?
I like to work out and go to the movies.
I love going to the movies too! Are you a fan of foreign films?
Yes, I love them! I love the subtitles.
Me too! I like watching foreign films because they're so different from what we're used to seeing.
I know, it's so much fun to be exposed to new cultures.
I agree! What's your favorite foreign film?
I'm not sure I can pick a favorite, but I recently saw Parasite and it was really good.
I haven't seen that one yet, but I've heard good things about it.
You should check it out! It's really funny and suspenseful.
I will! Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to collect stamps and go to the gym.
That's cool! I've never been much of a stamp collector, but I like going to the gym.
I like to go to the gym to stay in shape.
Me too! I find it's a great way to relieve stress and clear my head.
I agree! It's also a great way to meet new people.
It is! I've met some great people at the gym.
